devdoc.author: Eman Herawy, StartFi Team.

MintNFTWithRoyalty(address,string,uint8,.details: : tokens are transfered directly to the admin wallet . Called by the token issuer .

params._tokenURI: : serialized json object that has the following data ( category, name , desc , tages, ipfs hash).

MintNFTWithoutRoyalty(address,string).details: : tokens are transfered directly to the admin wallet. Called by the token issuer .

params._tokenURI: : serialized json object that has the following data ( category, name , desc , tages, ipfs hash).

params.newFees: : integer number represents the new fees.

changeNftContract(address).details: for later on upgrade , if we have.

changePaymentContract(address).details: for later on upgrade , if we have

info().details: :  function to get all the public info about the contract.

returns._0: NFT token address, utility token address, minting fees.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: StartFi NFT Payment contract. [ desc ] : contract to handle minting NFT after the contract is approved to transfer the fees by STFI.

MintNFTWithRoyalty(address,string,uint8,.notice: caller should approve the contract to transfer the fees first.

MintNFTWithoutRoyalty(address,string).notice: caller should approve the contract to transfer the fees first.
